title: COVID claims two more lives in Odisha | Sambad English
description: Bhubaneswar: The deadly COVID-19 claimed two more lives in Odisha in the last 24 hours, informed the State Health & Family Welfare Department today. The two fresh fatalities due to COVID-19 were reported from Balangir and Kendrapara districts. The COVID patients died while undergoing treatment in hospitals. title: Pawan Kalyan Stareer Vakeel Saab: 2 Cinema Halls In Odisha
description: Blatant violations of Covid-19 guidelines forced authorities to seal two cinema halls in Paralakhemundi in Gajapati district on Saturday.

description: On the directive of the Chief Minister, two senior officials on Saturday left for the two western Odisha districts of Nuapada and Kalahandi near the border of Chhattisgarh to oversee the COVID-19 situation.

title: Odisha cops in plain clothes to nab COVID-19 violators | Sambad English
description: Bhubaneswar: A day after Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik, in a video message addressing the people of the state, initiated 14-day ‘Mask Abhiyaan’, the Commissionerate Police (CP) formed special teams for strict enforcement of the same in the Twin City of Cuttack and Bhubaneswar. Bhubaneswar DCP (Security) Nirmala Satpathy said around 20 teams have been formed […]

title: Orissa High Court dismisses plea claiming that ‘red ant chutney’ can prevent COVID-19 infection
description: The Orissa High Court recently dismissed a plea which claimed that ‘Kaai (Kukuti) Chutney (paste)’ which is prepared using red ants can prevent infection through the COVID-19 virus.
